mapper.select: SELECT s.stage AS stage, s.create_time AS createTime FROM construction_order c LEFT JOIN project_stage_log s ON s.order_no=c.order_no WHERE c.project_no=#{projectNo} AND s.type =#{type}
SELECT order_stage as taskStage, order_no as orderNo, type as type FROM construction_order WHERE project_no = #{projectNo}

SELECT ci.company_name AS constructionCompany, ps.task_num taskNum, deso.money as cost, ps.delay delay FROM construction_order deso LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON deso.company_id = ci.company_id LEFT JOIN project_scheduling ps ON ps.project_no=deso.project_no WHERE deso.project_no=#{projectNo} AND deso.status=#{status}
